programme.desc: Three years since Jurassic World was destroyed and abandoned, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from an extinction-level volcano eruption.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1 - EP 1145
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Jack Black is Po, the unlikely hero chosen to fulfill an ancient kung fu prophecy in this delightful animation voiced by a star-studded cast.

programme.title: Angus, Thongs And Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: Eccentric but loveable 14 year-old Georgia Nicolson tries to overcome the trials and tribulations of growing up.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world.

programme.title: Jack The Giant Slayer
programme.desc: An epic twist of the classic tale where Jack climbs the beanstalk and battles marauding giants.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: Next Of Kin
programme.desc: A documentary filmmaker follows Margot, as she heads to a secluded Amish community in the hopes of meeting and learning about her long-lost mother and extended family. Following a string of strange occurrences and discoveries, she soon realizes this community that welcomed them into their home might be hiding something sinister...

programme.title: A Nightmare On Elm Street
programme.desc: Freddy Krueger, the razor-fingered iconic killer who haunts the dreams of teenagers and kills them in their sleep, returns to everyone's nightmares.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: A stuntman working a movie production is hired to find the missing lead actor, instead, he gets framed for a murder.

programme.title: River Wild
programme.desc: A brother and sister embark on a white-water rafting trip with a small group, including the siblings' childhood friend (an ex-convict), who turns out to be dangerous.

programme.title: Land Of Gold
programme.desc: A truck driver finds a young Mexican American girl inside his shipping container and his life takes a turn as he tries to reunite her with her family.

programme.title: Justice League: Crisis On Infinite Earths - Part Three
programme.desc: As the heroes find themselves helpless to stop a wave of destruction, they must make a terrible choice: which Earth, if any, will be saved?

programme.title: The Leisure Class
programme.desc: The winning entry from HBO's Project Greenlight about a man trying to marry into a wealthy family and his wild, unpredictable brother who could ruin everything.

programme.title: Disturbia
programme.desc: A teenager under house arrest begins spying on his neighbours, one of whom he suspects is a killer.

programme.title: Wrong Turn At Tahoe
programme.desc: Joshua is a tough-as-nails collector for the mob who, one day, gets caught in the middle of a double-cross involving the biggest drug lord in the business.

programme.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: In their parallel journeys, the Fellowship will stand against the powerful forces spreading from the Two Towers.

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: The U.S. President is about to be overthrown in a coup- it's up to the US military's last loyal officer to stop the uprising.

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: Jailed soccer star Vinnie Jones leads a group of prison inmates in a match against the prison guards

programme.title: Fellow Traveller
programme.desc: In the Golden Age of Hollywood, 2 men had it all. But when the witch hunts of McCarthyism came, it drove one out of the country and the other to suicide.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After a car crash, a woman wakes up in an underground bunker with a stranger, who claims to have saved her from the apocalypse in the outside world.

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: D-Day invasion finds two paratroopers caught behind enemy lines fighting Nazis and supernatural forces, resulting from a secret Nazi experiment.

programme.title: High Ground
programme.desc: When a mysterious prisoner lands in his jail, a border town sheriff faces the wrath of a brutal cartel.

programme.title: Maxxxine
programme.desc: Adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break, but a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat Legends: Cage Match
programme.desc: Johnny Cage has his dreams of 'A' list stardom derailed when his co-star goes missing.

programme.title: Subservience
programme.desc: With his wife in the hospital, a struggling father purchases a domestic AI to help simplify his home. But as the lifelike robot grows attached to her new owner, boundaries are crossed. Soon she becomes determined to eliminate what she perceives as the true threat to his happiness: his family.

programme.title: Game Change
programme.desc: Adapted from the non-fiction book of the same name, this HBO Original Movie provides an insider's look at the 2008 US presidential election.

programme.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: In their parallel journeys, the Fellowship will stand against the powerful forces spreading from the Two Towers.

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: Colin Farrell stars in this adaptation of Pocahontas, about an English explorer and Native American princess caught between love and duty to their nation.

programme.title: Reagan

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 4
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 21
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2699
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Not Far From Here
programme.desc: Even with limited vacation time, you can still explore the Greater Bay Area, thanks to this show! C Kwan, Billy Luk and Karen Wu team up to discover the Greater Bay Area, savouring modern Cantonese cuisine, exquisite French food, dessert Omakase and more!

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 15
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 5
programme.desc: Lok-yee is bullied. She is nearly hit by some vehicle as she rushes out onto the road. Fortunately, Kwok-yin saves her. Kwok-yin escorts Lok-yee back home. They are shocked to see Westminster frothing at the mouth. And there are syringes and drugs on the floor. While on patrol, Chi-hin and Kwok-wai run into drug addict Cheung Tung, who is dumping a body. They find out the deceased got the goods from small dealer Viper Ming. Kwok-yin informs on Viper Ming to Ruthless.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 6
programme.desc: Kwok-wai does not know what to do as he realizes his daughter Tung-tung is missing. Big Ghost receives a call from the kidnapper. He loves money more than anything else. He also claims he has four kids and does not care whether Siu-ho is dead or alive. Kwok-wai is at his wits’ end and resorts to consulting Siu-ho’s mother Ching. Ching ignores Big Ghost’s objection and gives Kwok-wai the money she has raised by herself. Kwok-wai goes to the mall to pay ransom.

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2102
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 4
programme.desc: Someone assaults Ching-tin. Fortunately, Man-sum turns up and intervenes just in time. Actually, that person is Lai Chau, the father of a gifted child called Lai Ka-ming, who was interviewed many years ago. Lai Chau alleges a news story written by Ching-tin caused his family to break up. Ching-tin feels she has wronged Lai Chau as she reviews the old story, so she wants to make it up to him by helping him locate missing Ka-ming.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 774
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 18
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 7
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 3
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 4
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 14
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 15

Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 3
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 4
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 14
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 15
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 19
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 8
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 19
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Taoist priest Kou is assigned to re-bury a rich man, in the hope that the new tomb will bring further prosperity. When the corpse turns into a vampire and wreaks havoc in the village, his disciples are also hurt by the vampire and possessed by a female ghost respectively. How can Kou save his disciples and hunt down the vampire at the same time?

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called "The Venoms", and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu skill from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in a fight between the Qing and Ming camps along the way, and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chu's family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiance Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan...

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the "Tsai Li Fu" style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back...

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 6
programme.desc: Kwok-wai does not know what to do as he realizes his daughter Tung-tung is missing. Big Ghost receives a call from the kidnapper. He loves money more than anything else. Ching ignores Big Ghost’s objection and gives Kwok-wai the money she has raised by herself. Kwok-wai goes to the mall to pay ransom.

Lai Chau alleges a news story written by Ching-tin caused his family to break up. Ching-tin feels she has wronged Lai Chau as she reviews the old story, so she wants to make it up to him by helping him locate missing Ka-ming.
